contentrichtext.text: '''[[Islington]]''' may refer to: ;United Kingdom: *[[Islington]], a district in London. **The [[London Borough of Islington]], the local authority containing the district. **The [[Metropolitan Borough of Islington]], the historic former authority. **[[Highbury & Islington station]] **[[Islington North (UK Parliament constituency)]] **[[Islington South and Finsbury (UK Parliament constituency)]] *[[Islington, Norfolk]], a village near [[King's Lynn]] *[[New Islington]], [[Manchester]] ;Canada: *[[Islington-City Centre West]], a central business district in Toronto. *[[Islington Avenue]], a major street in Toronto. *[[Islington (TTC)]], a Toronto subway station *[[Islington, Newfoundland and Labrador]]. ;United States: *[[Islington Landing, Virginia|Islington Landing]], a settlement in [[Richmond County, Virginia]]. *[[Islington, Massachusetts|Islington]], a subdivision of Westwood, Massachusetts. **[[Islington (MBTA station)]] ;Jamaica: *[[Islington, Jamaica]], a village in the parish of Saint Mary. ;Australia: *[[Islington, New South Wales|Islington]], a suburb of Newcastle, New South Wales. *[[Islington, South Australia|Islington]], a suburb of [[Adelaide, South Australia]]. ;New Zealand: *[[Islington, New Zealand|Islington]], a suburb of [[Christchurch]]. == See also == * [[Islington (horse)]], thoroughbred racehorse * [[Ingliston]] {{disambig}}
